document.full_text: american nick watney kept his cool to win the wgc-cadillac championship sunday by two strokes over compatriot dustin johnson for the biggest win of his career.
document.title: american watney wins wgc-cadillac championship
lines_and_colors: american nick watney kept his cool to win the wgc-cadillac championship sunday by two strokes over compatriot dustin johnson for the biggest win of his career.
